title: India’s Streaming Universe Hits 601 Million Users as Connected TV Surges 87%
summary: India’s streaming audience has reached 601.2 million users, representing over 40% of the country’s population, according to new research from Ormax Media. The fifth edition of The Ormax OTT Audience Report: 2025 reveals a maturing market where growth has moderated to 10% year-over-year, down from t…
